subject: Re: Mortage Approval. Fri, 11 May 2007 17:25:06 -0500
body:
Refinance updates,

Would you like to reduce your current mortgage payment?  Refinance us lowest rate.  Your loan has been approved.

You can receive $278,000 for
$685 per month save 45%.

Please respond Now. 
http://0rz.pixnet.tw/9a2GX

Boyd Strong
Loan Approval Center 


"When nothing seems to help, I go and look at a stonecutter hammering away at his rock perhaps a hundred times without as much as a crack showing in it. Yet at the hundred and first blow it will split in two, and I know it was not that blow that did it, but all that had gone before."  -- Jacob August Riis
